project.name: UIMA ${project.artifactId}
project.description: UIMA (Unstructured Information Management Architecture). UIMA promotes community development and reuse of annotators that extract metadata from unstructured information (text, audio, video, etc.); it provides for externalized declaration of type systems, component configuration, aggregation, and more, supports scalablity, and provides tooling.
